VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Patent Growth Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Patent Growth Rate is Revenue Growth Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Patent Growth Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Patent Growth Rate is R&D Investment Ratio.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Power Transmission and Distribution Loss Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Hunt-Thompson?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Power Transmission and Distribution Loss Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ R&D Investment Ratio}.

VE.Q: What is the value of Hunt-Thompson on the Power Transmission and Distribution Loss Rate in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Hunt-Thompson on the Safety dimension is {90}.

VE.Q: What is the value of Hunt-Thompson on the Revenue Growth Rate in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Hunt-Thompson on the Safety dimension is {70}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label Hunt-Thompson across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of Hunt-Thompson across all dimensions is {90}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label Hunt-Thompson across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of Hunt-Thompson across all dimensions is {90}.

SC.A: The average value of Revenue Growth Rate is {70.0}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Hunt-Thompson

NF.Q: Which labels have scores below 34 for the R&D Investment Ratio dimension? Please list the labels and corresponding scores.
For Hunt-Thompson in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores above 79? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.
NF.A: {Power Transmission and Distribution Loss Rate} is {90}, {Patent Growth Rate} is {88}, {Net Profit Margin } is {81}

NF.Q: Which labels have scores above 70 for the Revenue Growth Rate dimension? Please list the labels and corresponding scores.

NC.Q: For Hunt-Thompson, which dimension has a higher score: Net Profit Margin  or Revenue Growth Rate?
NC.A: {Net Profit Margin } has a higher score than Revenue Growth Rate for Hunt-Thompson.

NC.Q: For Hunt-Thompson, which dimension has a higher score: Revenue Growth Rate or Power Transmission and Distribution Loss Rate?
NC.A: {Power Transmission and Distribution Loss Rate} has a higher score than Revenue Growth Rate for Hunt-Thompson.

MSR.Q: For Hunt-Thompson, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Hunt-Thompson most needs to improve its {R&D Investment Ratio}.
